The test is deprecated since the class under test in deprecated.  Otherwise, you'd get deprecation 
warnings on the test.  The test should be modified to compare the output from DateTimeDateFormat with 
a reference output from SimpleDateFormat, both of which would be affected by locale changes.

creator: genman@noderunner.net
text: Test made more robust with explicit Locale parameter. Checked into SVN trunk.

Elias committed changes in r 500423 against log4j/trunk which added new code paths to log4j instead of 
changing the expectations of the test as suggested in my comment of 2007-01-15.  Reopening for 
further discussion and backporting to log4j 1.2.
